title: N135 Duke Talk Of The Diamond SOLD
author: buymycards

posts.post_title: N135 Duke Talk Of The Diamond SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hello, I would like to sell this N135 card.  This is "No Game", showing an umpire calling the game because of rain.

The Standard Catalog shows the measurements for this set at 2 1/2 x 4 1/8.  This one measures slightly over 2 1/4 by 4 1/8.  I don't see any evidence of trimming, so this may have came from the factory this way.

If you look closely you can see a vertical crease running the height of the card right over the gun case.

SOLD

Thanks, Rick

Please send an email to [url]rickmcquillan@gmail.com[/url]

Will trade for a low condition t213-2 that I don't have or a low condition Weil Baking.

Thanks, Rick
